required.png.description: Screenshot of the "Required" button in the bottom right corner of a Google Form question toggled on

format.png.description: Screenshot of the question types available in the menu at the top right corner of a Google Form question with "Checkboxes" selected

description.png.description: Screenshot of the drop down menu beneath the 3 dots in the bottom right corner of a Google Form with "Description" selected

validate.png.description: Screenshot of the drop down menu beneath the 3 dots in the bottom right corner of a Google Form question with "Response validation" selected

validation.png.description: Screenshot of an example validation, which reads "Number Between 24 and 96 Invalid height!"
